articles.author: Oluwashina Okeleji
articles.title: In African women’s football, homophobia still poses a barrier
articles.description: In Nigeria, ex-players allege they were discriminated against by officials over real or perceived sexual preferences.
articles.content:
Nigerias hegemonic decades-long dominance over Africas womens football scene has long masked a dark secret: Openly homosexual players are not allowed.
The Super Falcons are Africas most prosperous n… [+7332 chars]
